channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Police shoot and kill teen armed with a replica handgun in upstate New York, authorities say
item.description: NEW YORK — Video released late Saturday shows an officer in upstate New York fatally shooting a 13-year-old boy who had been tackled to the ground after he ran from police and pointed a replica handgun at them.

item.title: Hundreds of millions at risk from Chinese shopping app malware
Wimbledon 2024 day one order of play: Who features on Monday, July 1?
item.description: Emma Raducanu is in action on Centre Court!

item.title: H Samuel launches 'permanent jewellery' by welding bracelets directly onto wrists
item.description: H Samuel is offering the new 'Perfect Weld' service that welds bracelets around shoppers' wrists following a viral TikTok trend

item.title: Look: Pennsylvania firefighters rescue four ducklings from storm drain
item.description: A team of Pennsylvania firefighters climbed into a storm drain to rescue a family of four trapped ducklings.

item.title: Ex-Northeastern University lab manager convicted of staging hoax explosion at Boston campus
item.description: A former lab manager at Northeastern University was convicted of staging a hoax explosion at the Boston campus and then lying about what happened to a federal agent.

item.title: Russian authorities detain suspect over St. Petersburg cafe blast
Inside the extreme haunted house where you’re ‘tortured and have your teeth pulled’
item.description: 'I was waterboarded, I was Tased, I was whipped.'

item.title: Britain forecast horror nationwide rainstorm in matter of days as weather maps turn blue
item.description: UK weather might be about to take another dramatic turn, as long range weather maps have the heatwave of the past week swiftly becoming a thing of the past, with huge rainclouds set to descend across the UK next weekend

item.title: Giant pandas Yun Chuan and Xin Bao arrive safely at San Diego Zoo
item.description: The San Diego Zoo announced the safe arrival of Yun Chuan and Xin Bao, the first giant pandas to enter the country in 21 years.

item.title: 3 killed in shooting at Georgia home as police probe possible murder-suicide
item.description: Three people were killed in a suspected murder-suicide Saturday in Coweta County, Georgia, authorities said.

item.title: READ: Trump indictment related to hush money payment
London weather after end of heatwave brings typical British summer
item.description: Sunday weather brings typical British summer temperatures.

item.title: Horoscopes today: Daily star sign predictions from Russell Grant on June 30
item.description: Today's horoscope will see one star sign be tactful in a disagreement, while another could meet with romance in an unexpected place. These are your Sunday horoscopes.

item.title: Pennsylvania woman wins $5M from birthday lottery ticket
item.description: A Pennsylvania woman who bought a lottery ticket to celebrate the dual milestones of her birthday and finishing cancer treatment won a $5 million prize.

item.title: After mass stranding, animal rescuers try to keep dolphins from shallow waters in Cape Cod
item.description: Animal rescuers were trying to keep dozens of dolphins away from shallow waters around Cape Cod on Saturday after 125 of the creatures stranded themselves a day earlier.

item.title: Trump pleads not guilty to 34 felony counts
What does the week have in store? Your tarot horoscope reading for July 1 to July 7
item.description: Get ready for a new week.

item.title: People are only just realising what Yahoo! stands for more than 30 years after launch
item.description: Yahoo! was founded in January 1994 by Jerry Yang and David Filo, with the website originally named Jerry and David's Guide to the World Wide Web before being renamed Yahoo! just three months later

item.title: Canadian candidate becomes the first to ever receive zero votes
item.description: A Canadian man has become the first candidate in the nation's history to receive zero votes in a contested federal election.

item.title: 11 people injured in escalator malfunction after Milwaukee Brewers game
item.description: Multiple people were injured when an escalator malfunctioned as fans were leaving American Family Field in Milwaukee following the Brewers game, the team announced.

item.title: The haunting Masters meltdown that changed Rory McIlroy's career
item.description: Slumped on his club, head buried in his arm, Rory McIlroy looked on the verge of tears.

item.title: I can’t stop hoping for a Dreamcast 2 and I know how Sega could do it – Reader’s Feature
item.description: A reader is given hope that a Dreamcast 2 console might finally be a possibility, if Sega takes up his suggestion for promoting its new games.

item.title: Chilling last five words of death row killer Richard Rojem who raped and murdered girl, 7
item.description: Richard Norman Rojem Jr. was executed for stabbing and killing his former stepdaughter. It was the 13th execution since the state reinstated capital punishment in October 2021

item.title: Rorschach-style ink blot posters are a mystery in Wichita
item.description: Posters resembling Rorschach ink blot tests have appeared in various locations around Wichita, Kans., and city officials said they are stumped as to their origins.
